**Wikipedia summary**:  
The <b>North American river otter</b> (<i><b>Lontra canadensis</b></i>), also known as the <b>northern river otter</b> and <b>river otter</b>, is a semiaquatic mammal that lives only on the North American continent, along its waterways and coasts. An adult North American river otter can weigh between 5.0 and 14&#160;kg (11.0 and 30.9&#160;lb). The river otter is protected and insulated by a thick, water-repellent coat of fur</p>...
